body_html:
@coldlionfanjin
Hi, it's been a while since I did these benchmarks and I no longer have access to the machine.

From my previous comments it seems this might help:
KMP_SETTINGS=1 KMP_BLOCKTIME=0 KMP_AFFINITY=granularity=fine,verbose,compact,1,0
OMP_NUM_THREADS=72 python models/tutorials/image/mnist/convolutional.py

Best of luck!

P.S.
Most of my ML focus is now on game bots on consumer GPU cards.

body:
@coldlionfanjin 
Hi, it's been a while since I did these benchmarks and I no longer have access to the machine.

From my previous comments it seems this might help:
  KMP_SETTINGS=1 KMP_BLOCKTIME=0 KMP_AFFINITY=granularity=fine,verbose,compact,1,0 
  OMP_NUM_THREADS=72 python models/tutorials/image/mnist/convolutional.py

Best of luck!

P.S.
Most of my ML focus is now on game bots on consumer GPU cards.
